LogueEffectInfo.Name: 逻辑工作室培训证书
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: 所有司书可使用远程战斗书页。
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“证明你可以持枪，至少不是毫无经验。”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 真没礼貌！
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: 你在这家商店无法买到更多的东西。
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“给我讲礼貌，你这个山顶洞人！”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 稀有的街头暴徒可动人偶
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [消耗品]使用时获得{0}眼。每赢得一场战斗或通过一个事件使此物品的价值+3。
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“除了这个我什么都没—卧槽这是那个街霸罗兰™！？”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 缓慢燃烧
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: 每一幕结束时“烧伤”层数只减少1/4而不是1/3

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 脑啡肽贴纸
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: 开启战斗时所有司书的初始情感等级为1级。
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“爱、心与控制脑啡肽！它让你前进。”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Desc: 所有未来的书页将显示为其升级后的版本。

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 火网
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: 对其他司书的远程书页所选的目标使用的远程书页的进攻型骰子威力+1
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“敌人在那个方向！ 收到。对那个方向进行压制。”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 废料护盾
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [消耗品]将1颗招架反击骰子(2~5)置入所选司书的反击列表。每通过1个章节使该骰子的最大值与最小值+1。
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“棍棒和石头可能会打断你的骨头。”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: HP子弹
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [消耗品]所选的司书恢复30%体力

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 4GGR0刺激
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [消耗品]所选的司书这一幕获得2层“强壮”

LogueEffectInfo.Name: RFLX刺激
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [消耗品]所选的司书这一幕获得2层“忍耐”

LogueEffectInfo.Name: W1-ND
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [消耗品]所选的司书这一幕获得3层“迅捷”

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 1R0N刺激
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [消耗品]所选的司书这一幕获得3层“守护”与“振奋”

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 物理学圣剑
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: 对体力高于90%的目标造成的伤害与混乱伤害+50%。

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 血流成河
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: 这一幕内场上所有角色造成的伤害与混乱伤害x2。 每场战斗可使用1次。

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 1级类固醇
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [消耗品]2幕内使所选司书的骰子最大值+2最小值-1。

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 咖啡因药丸
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [消耗品]2幕内使所选司书的骰子最小值+2最大值-1。

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 光芒碎片
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [消耗品]所选的倒下的司书以其一半体力上限的体力复活。
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“这一刻，你被无尽的自我实现所拥抱。”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 过去
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: 不再显示战斗书页奖励。

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 长兄的锁链
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: 使用战斗书页时手中每有1张同名书页使其所有骰子威力+1。
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“在其中一条链子上刻着人们几乎看不出的‘大富翁’的字样。”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 收割者的镰刀
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: 每一幕开始时使所有友方角色获得5层“暴击”。任何角色触发“暴击”效果时恢复5点体力。
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“只有勇敢的人才能直面死亡并声称自己不需要帮助。”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 锈链
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: 所有友方角色命中目标时施加等同于自身“流血”层数一半的“流血”。
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“由于过度使用这些链条，血液、铁锈和金属屑似乎混合在了一起。”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 脾出血
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: 所有友方角色暴击命中目标时下一幕对目标施加2层“流血” 拥有不少于10层“流血”的敌方角色死亡时将对所有其他敌方角色造成其“流血”层数一半的伤害。任何角色触发“暴击”效果时恢复5点体力。
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“一种奇怪的人造器官，似乎含有巨量的抗凝剂。”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 遥控器
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: 获得1张佚亡装备书页。 [装备时]将开启舞台时手中的书页交给指定司书 移除目标所有光芒并卸下其装备的所有非0费的书页 使用后本道具将移除
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“你有一种感觉，似乎有什么人把他们的线路弄乱了……”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 灵感
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: 在本章节内的每一幕开始时，所有司书将随机分别获得以下效果： 3层“强壮” 3层“忍耐” 3层“守护” 3层“易损” 眩晕

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 杀戮光环
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [全局]敌方角色受到的所有非直接攻击伤害x2。

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 铁布衫秘籍
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: 所有司书使用防御型骰子拼点胜利时对目标施加1层“烧伤”

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 神龙拳秘籍
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: 所有司书攻击命中目标时对目标施加1层“烧伤”
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“源自现已解散的宣和会的古老招式。”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Well-tuned Weapons
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [Global] All current non-upgraded Hardcover pages become upgraded. Every 9th Hardcover page a librarian uses, they restore 2 Light and gain 1 Max Light Capacity till end of the Act.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Gambler's Eye Augment
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [Global] Every 7th Objet d'art page a librarian uses, they activate all effects of this item at once. When a librarian uses an Objet d'art page, they have a 7% chance to activate any number of the following effects: -Gain 2 Luck this Scene -Gain 5 Critical Strike this Scene -Gain 2 Haste next Scene -Gain 10 Stagger Shield this Scene -Restore 1 Light -Draw 1 page
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#F7DA5D>“Money brings in tools, and tools bring superiority.”</color> - Viiru

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Not-So Ordinary Clothes
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: [Global] All librarians while Staggered have their resistances set to 'Weak' instead of 'Fatal'.
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#44269C>“Produced by a peculiar tailor whose name has been forgotten in the many trades of such wares.”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: In-Statis Blaze
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Upon pick up, choose a Combat Page and remove it from inventory. Boost the min/max value of all dice on the page by +2/1. At the start of each Act, add this Combat Page to the hand of each Librarian.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: In-Statis Spark
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Upon pick up, choose a Combat Page and remove it from inventory. Whenever a Librarian uses the Combat Page, they gain 3 Protection and Stagger Protection for the Scene. At the start of each Act, add this Combat Page to the hand of each Librarian.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: In-Statis Light
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Upon pick up, choose a Combat Page and remove it from inventory. Lower the Cost of the page by 1 and whenever a Librarian uses the Combat Page, they restore 1 Light and draw 1 page. At the start of each Act, add this Combat Page to the hand of each Librarian.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Duplicator
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: When 2+ Librarians use the same Combat Page during the same Scene, add a copy of that Combat Page to their hands.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Zwei Swordstyle
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Upon winning a clash with Slash dice, gain 1 Endurance next Scene.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Zwei 'Art of Blocking' Manual
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Upon winning a clash against Offensive dice with a Block die, gain 1 Strength this Scene.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Ruined Dummy
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Restore 1 Light when using a Combat Page without an ability. Dice without abilities gain +1 Power.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Flicker-switch
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: When a Librarian exhausts a Combat Page, reduce the Cost of a random page in their hand by 2 until used.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: T-Corp Restoration Protocol
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: The first time a Librarian accumulates 15+ damage taken during a single Act, they gain 10 Restoration. (Once per Act) (Restoration - In 3 Scenes, purge this and this character recovers X HP. Increase stack by half of the damage received while this character has this status.)

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Timepiece
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: At the end of the 7th Scene, all Librarians fully restore Light and draw 3 pages. Librarians who are not Emotion Level 5+ gain an Emotion Level.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Joker Card
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: At the start of the Act, add a Single-use On-Play Combat Page to the hand of all Librarians that allows them to discard their entire hand and draw 4 pages.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Moonstone Gyroscope
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Whenever a Librarian discards a Combat Page, they recover Stagger Resist equal to (2 + Cost of the discarded page).
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“It feels as if your sense of orientation is gone yet you remain standing.”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Duffel Bag
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Upon pick up, gain 150 Ahn.
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“Whoever left this orange bag must've been in a hurry...”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Avalon Stimpack
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Whenever a Librarian is inflicted with a status ailment, they gain 1 Resilience that Scene. (Up to 3 times per Scene) At the start of each Scene, all Librarians remove stacks of a random status ailment up to Resilience amount and lose that amount of Resilience.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Mourning Veil
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: When a Librarian dies, another Librarian recovers HP/Stagger Resist equal to 30% of the dead Librarian's Max HP/Stagger Resist.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Training Wheels
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: Each Scene, increase the Speed value of all Speed dice of Librarians with a value equal to the slowest Speed die of the Librarians by +3.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Budget 'DIY-Workshopper' Toolkit
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: At the start of the Act, all Librarians temporarily upgrade 1 random Combat Page in their deck.

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Leather Satchel
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: At the start of the Act, all Librarians draw 1 page and gain +1 Max Hand Size Slot.
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“Extra pockets are always welcome in this business.”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Sentinel Bracers
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: At the start of combat, all Librarians playing Combat Pages without any Offensive dice or not using any pages, gain 8 Shield and Stagger Shield for that Scene.
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“How the hell did these become popular as a brand image?”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Concept Converter
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: When skipping Book rewards, gain 5 Ahn for every Book skipped. When skipping choosing a card, gain 2 Ahn.
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#CACACA>“Who in their right mind would sellout like this?”</color>

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Color Mixer
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: At the start of the Act, each Librarian draws 1 page and reduces the Cost of the highest rarity page in hand by 1 until used if their deck contains one of each Rarity. (Paperback, Hardcover, Limited and Objet d'art)

LogueEffectInfo.Name: White Cotton Flower
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: At the start of each Scene, all Librarians gain 1 Bleed Protection. While activated, when a character would get Staggered, they instead recover from Stagger and are inflicted with Bleed equal to (Max Stagger Resist / 6) this Scene. (Rounded Up)

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Taking Point: Expose Weakness
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: At the start of every Scene, the Librarian with the highest HP gains 'En Garde' status. (En Garde - Upon winning 3 clashes against the same target, inflict 1 Fragile and Stagger Fragile to them next Scene)

LogueEffectInfo.Name: Construction and You: Finding Weaknesses
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: All Librarians deal 2 bonus damage/Stagger damage upon winning a clash against an opponent with Strength/Endurance

LogueEffectInfo.Name: 指令
LogueEffectInfo.Desc: 每一幕开始时指定1名司书 该司书连续对1名目标使用战斗书页时造成的伤害与混乱伤害+10%(至多30%) 若对其他目标使用战斗书页则该次行动中使其造成的伤害与混乱伤害-50%
LogueEffectInfo.FlavorText: <color=#4FACFF>“一张看起来很小巧的小纸条。上面写着‘专注于你面前的人。‘”</color>
